actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the continued operation of the Public Health Service hospitals.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare to (1) assure that all Public Health Service Hospitals continue in operation and (2) that such hospitals continue to provide the same services as were provided as of January 1, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the continued operation of the Public Health Service hospitals.
